import numpy as np

img_h = 224
img_w = 224
n_classes = 3

# labelsæ˜ å°„
def label_map(labels):
    labelmap = np.zeros([img_h, img_w, n_calsses])
    for h in range(img_h):
        for w in range(img_w):
            labelmap[h, w, labels[h][w]] = 1
    return labelmap

    if mode == 'train':
